content.overview: Creates a background for widgets. The properties are used to create the style of the widgets. The methods are used when the widgets have already been created.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: SetColor
methods.description: Changes the background color of the widget.

methods.name: SetTintColor
methods.description: Applies a color to the background.
info: Unlike the SetColor method, this one will apply a color over the entire background, including the edges.

methods.name: SetColors
info: Like the Colors property, it needs a list of Text (HTML Colors) or Colors.

methods.name: SetStroke
methods.description: Changes the borders of the background.

methods.name: SetFileSource
info: Unlike the corresponding property, this method does accept URLs.

properties.name: Colors
info: This property sets a gradient as the background.
The items in the list are colors, Text and Colors are supported.

properties.name: BorderWidth
properties.description: Sets the thickness of the background edges.

properties.name: RippleColor
properties.description: Sets the color of the wave that is activated when the widget is pressed.
info: For the wave effect to show, the widget needs to be clickable.

properties.name: BorderColor
properties.description: Sets the color of the background borders.

properties.name: BorderRadius
properties.description: Sets the radius of the corners of the bottom.

properties.name: GradientDirection
properties.description: Sets the direction of the gradient.
info: The values ​​are obtained from the property blocks.

properties.name: FileSource
properties.description: Sets the image to be displayed in the background.
info: The text should be a path to a file or the name of a file found in the assets of the project.
If this block is used, all other properties will be ignored to only display the image.
